channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Government to lower domestic abuse age after teen Holly Newton's murder
item.description: Currently in UK law, both the abuser and the victim must be over 16 for it to be considered a domestic abuse crime, but the Home Secretary has said sh...

item.title: Doctor headbutted waiter after turning up 3 hours late for table and told restaurant closed
item.description: Nganjo Endeley fractured the 21-year-old waiter's eye socket with a powerful headbutt after he showed up to a restaurant three hours late and was told...

item.title: Dozens of ‘prisoners’ on the run from jail – but they haven’t gotten very far
item.description: 135 marathon fans took on the unique course at an unused Victorian jail.

item.title: Hundreds turn out for Halloween parade that wasn’t real
item.description: The confusion seems to have originated from an AI-generated website.

item.title: Family's horror as cleaners caught going through belongings in Jet2 holiday resort
item.description: Tommy Hudson, from County Durham, claims he found cleaners at the Elios Hill hotel in Crete going through a bag and drinking from a bottle of Sprite i...

item.title: Mum issues warning over two 'mild' symptoms after she's diagnosed with stage 4 cancer
item.description: A mum has revealed how she diagnosed her own stage 4 colon cancer and what the ‘key signs’ are that you should look out for when it comes to screening...

item.title: Greggs loving runner takes on 9,600 calorie sausage roll eating marathon
item.description: A runner loves Greggs so much he built it into his marathon training regime.

item.title: Chilling moment electrician hit in face by huge flame as he repairs power station
item.description: The Russian electrician came close to death after he tried to access a faulty part of a power substation - before huge flames started to fly straight ...

item.title: Dad woke up thinking it was 1980 after he was injured in a car crash
item.description: After he was hit by a car and left in a coma in 2019, Luciano D'Adamo woke up believing the year was 1980

item.title: Naked British tourist falls from balcony in Thailand covered in poo
item.description: The man was allegedly 'extremely drunk' when he returned to his room in the early hours of Monday morning.
